summary: 此節點與 Facebook 互動，使用 Graph API。

parameters.name: host url
parameters.description: The Host URL of the request. Choose between Default or Video Uploads.

parameters.name: http request method
parameters.description: The HTTP Method to be used for the request. Choose between GET, POST, or DELETE.

parameters.name: graph api version
parameters.description: The version of the Graph API to be used in the request.

parameters.name: node
parameters.description: The node on which to operate. A unique object with a unique ID.

parameters.name: edge
parameters.description: Edge of the node on which to operate. Represents collections of objects attached to the node.

parameters.name: ignore ssl issues (insecure)
parameters.description: Whether to connect even if SSL certificate validation is not possible.

parameters.name: send binary file
parameters.description: Whether binary data should be sent as body. Only shown for POST and PUT requests.

parameters.name: input binary field
parameters.description: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded. Only shown if 'send binary file' is true.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The list of fields to request in the GET request.

parameters.name: query parameters json
parameters.description: The query parameters to send, defined as a JSON object.
